generated_body: The article likely discusses a recent dispute between Taylor Swift and her former record label, Big Machine, regarding unpaid royalties amounting to $7.9 million. Readers can expect an overview of the background of Swift's relationship with Big Machine, including her efforts to regain control of her music catalog.
